actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to allow a host compacting State to contract with another compact for disposal of low-level radioactive waste.

summary.text: Amends the Low-Level Radioactive Waste Policy Act to provide that no regional interstate compact for low-level radioactive waste disposal shall be construed to restrict the authority of a host State to contract with another compact for the disposal of low-level radioactive waste that the host State is responsible for disposing of during its tenure as a host State.

titles.title: A bill to allow a host compacting State to contract with another compact for disposal of low-level radioactive waste.
